home.title: Enhanced Safety with SmartBus
home.description: Track school buses in real time with a unified dashboard for routes, stops, and schedules. Instant alerts keep parents, drivers, and school admins in sync—with live updates as fast as ~3 seconds.

about.title: Built for Safety, Powered by Real-Time Tracking
about.paragraph1: SmartBus keeps schools, drivers, and families in sync. Our SSB 1.0 platform unifies bus schedules, routes, and student rosters into one dashboard—replacing scattered phone calls and spreadsheets. Real-time GPS updates (≈3-second latency) and role-based alerts improve transparency and peace of mind.
about.paragraph2: Whether you're managing a fleet or tracking your child's ride, SmartBus scales for daily operations—300+ buses concurrently—with built-in driver assignments, stop lists, en route notifications, and incident reporting.

card1.title: Real-Time GPS Tracking
card1.description: View live bus locations with route progress and stop distances—updates refresh in ~3 seconds for accurate arrival times.

card2.title: Unified Operations
card2.description: One dashboard for schedules, routes, drivers, and student lists—goodbye to chains of calls and scattered spreadsheets.

card3.title: Smart Alerts for Everyone
card3.description: Role-based notifications keep parents, drivers, and school admins in sync—updates on arrivals, delays, or incidents.

card4.title: Built to Scale
card4.description: Reliable performance for daily operations—supports tracking 300+ buses concurrently without missing a beat.
